content: Enable this setting to disable downloads of files and folders from this room shared via a link

comment.text: This translation key enables or disables the download of files and folders from a shared room when accessed via a link. It is used in a toggle block within an edit link panel to provide users with a choice on how to manage file downloads.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'قم بتمكين هذا الإعداد لتعطيل تنزيلات الملفات والمجلدات من هذه الغرفة المشتركة عبر رابط' is a literal translation and could be improved for naturalness. A more fluid translation would convey the same meaning more effectively for a Saudi Arabian audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: فعِّل هذا الإعداد لمنع تنزيل الملفات والمجلدات من هذه الغرفة عند مشاركتها عبر رابط.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'otaq' (room) is spelled correctly, but it's a more formal term. 'Otaq' can be replaced with a more casual equivalent like 'ochan'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ochan

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure is slightly clunky. It could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu tənzimləməni aktiv etməklə, link vasitəsilə bu otaqdan (or ochan) paylaşılan fayl və qovluqların endirilməsi deaktiv ediləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation conveys the general meaning, 'deaktiv etmək' is a direct translation of 'disable'. A more natural-sounding option might be 'bağlamaq' or 'qapadmaq'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: bağlamaq

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Enable this setting' is translated as 'Ενεργοποιήστε αυτήν τη ρύθμιση', which is technically correct but sounds slightly formal and less conversational. A more natural translation might be 'Ενεργοποιήστε αυτή τη ρύθμιση...' or 'Για να απενεργοποιήσετε...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ενεργοποιήστε αυτή τη ρύθμιση για να...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation maintains the structure of the English sentence closely. A slightly more fluent Greek phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Για να απενεργοποιήσετε τη λειτουργία λήψης αρχείων και φακέλων από αυτό το δωμάτιο, το οποίο έχει κοινοποιηθεί μέσω συνδέσμου, ενεργοποιήστε αυτή τη ρύθμιση.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Active esta opción' is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Habilite esta opción' or 'Para desactivar las descargas... habilite esta opción'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Habilite esta opción para desactivar las descargas de archivos y carpetas de esta sala compartidos a través de un enlace.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ota tämä asetus käyttöön, jos haluat poistaa käytöstä" is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'Käytä tätä asetusta estääksesi...' or 'Voit ottaa tämän asetuksen käyttöön estääksesi...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käytä tätä asetusta estääksesi tiedostojen ja kansioiden lataukset...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English specifies "from this room shared via a link". The Finnish translation includes "tässä linkin kautta jaetusta huoneesta" which is accurate, but a little verbose. It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tässä linkin kautta jaetussa huoneessa

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "որոնք համօգտագործվում են հղման միջոցով" (which are shared via a link) is a bit awkward and doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'shared via a link.' It implies a reciprocal sharing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to something like "որոնք կիսվել են հղման միջոցով" (which have been shared via a link) or "որոնք հասանելի են հղման միջոցով" (which are accessible via a link).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Japanese. "Enable this setting" is awkwardly translated. It doesn't convey the intended meaning effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: リンク経由で共有されたこの部屋からのファイルとフォルダのダウンロードを禁止するには、この設定を有効にしてください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is quite long. While grammatically correct, shorter sentences often improve readability in UI text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この設定を有効にすると、リンク経由で共有されたこの部屋からのファイルとフォルダのダウンロードが禁止されます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເປີດໃຊ້' is sometimes translated as 'activate' instead of 'enable' depending on context. While not strictly incorrect, 'enable' aligns better with the English original in this specific context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປິດການດາວໂຫຼດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຈາກຫ້ອງນີ້ທີ່ແບ່ງປັນຜ່ານລິ້ງ' is slightly awkward in Lao. It would flow better if rephrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຈາກຫ້ອງນີ້ທີ່ແບ່ງປັນຜ່ານລິ້ງສາມາດດາວໂຫຼດໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "предоставлен доступ по ссылке" (provided access via a link) is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the idea that the files and folders are shared via a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Включите этот параметр, чтобы запретить загрузку файлов и папок, которыми поделились по ссылке, из этой комнаты

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'බාගැනීම' is technically correct, but 'ගබඩා කිරීම' might be more accurate in this context (downloading implies storing, not just taking).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බාගැනීම වෙනුවට ගබඩා කිරීම භාවිතා කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While understandable, the sentence structure could be slightly improved for better flow. 'මෙම සැකසුම සබල කරන්න' could be phrased more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම සැකසුම සබල කිරීමෙන්, සබැඳියකින් බෙදාගත් කාමරයේ ගොනු සහ බහාලුම් බාගැනීම අබල කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'онемогућиш' (you disable) is a bit too informal and direct for a settings description. A more polite phrasing would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Омогући ово подешавање да бисте спречили преузимање датотека и фолдера из ове собе дељених путем линка

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks the consistency in capitalization. It should start with an uppercase letter as it's a full sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Омогући ово подешавање да бисте спречили преузимање датотека и фолдера из ове собе дељених путем линка

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. 'Omogući ovo podešavanje da onemogućiš...' feels less natural. It's better to phrase it more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogući ovo podešavanje da sprečiš preuzimanje datoteka i foldera iz ove sobe deljenih putem linka

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'onemogućiš' (disable) is technically correct, 'sprečiš' (prevent) is often more natural and accurate in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'onemogućiš' with 'sprečiš'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Увімкніть цей параметр, щоб заборонити завантаження файлів і папок із цієї кімнати, доступ до яких надано за посиланням' is a bit verbose and literal. A more natural and concise translation would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Увімкніть цей параметр, щоб заборонити завантаження файлів і папок із кімнати, на яку є посилання.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'доступ до яких надано за посиланням' is unnecessarily complex. A simpler way to convey the same meaning exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: на яку є посилання

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Enable this setting" is not ideal. "Bật cài đặt này" is technically correct, but sounds a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be "Kích hoạt cài đặt này" or "Mở cài đặt này".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kích hoạt cài đặt này
